modName: Clank -- Summon a Dwemer automaton to fight for you.
summary: Clank is a summonable Dwemer automaton that looks like an armored soldier.  It's invulnerable, loud and little slow.  It persists for about 3 minutes.  Clank is an extremely effective fighter.
descriptionHtml:
Sometimes a Khajiit sneak thief doesn't want a follower that could betray their presence and more importantly demand a cut of the loot.  If only there was a  summonable fighter like an atronach but something less likely to splash magic flames and lightning all about that can singe one's fur. 

Clank is a summonable Dwemer weapon that looks like an armored soldier.  It's invulnerable, loud and little slow.  It persists for about 3 minutes.  Clank is an extremely effective fighter.  Using only a sword and an enchanted shield it's able to take down four Ronzo bandits, including a boss, with time to spare.

Clank uses its own weapons, combat style, attack data and magic effects and spells.  There shouldn't be any conflicts with anything.  Clank requires only Skyrim and the official update.   Tested with EFF and a bunch of mods, so far no problems found.

R3 is a bigger slower sword-less Clank.  It's a punch Clank!  Summon it and flee!  Or watch from the shadows.  Sometimes the shield charge attack glitches and Clank is stuck in reverse.  Recasting will resolve this.

Why name it Clank?  The Dwemer automatons remind me of Phil Foglio's comic Girl Genius.  Clank is a generic term for robots, battle-clanks, dingbots and of course Fun-Sized Mobile Agony and Death Dispensers.

You'll find a spell book for summoning Clank in the torturer's knapsack at Helgen keep.  Clank's summoning spell takes a while to cast so be patient.
author: GrumpyMule
